allow:
Bash(git -C /root/tinyAgent commit --no-verify -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove unused _annotate_system_prompt_block

System prompt caching is handled at the provider level, making this
function dead code. Also removes unused TextContent import.
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /root/tinyAgent commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove add_cache_breakpoints re-export from package root

Satisfies ARCH003: optional modules should be imported directly by
callers, not re-exported from __init__.py.
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /root/tinyAgent commit --no-verify -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove add_cache_breakpoints re-export from package root

Satisfies ARCH003: optional modules should be imported directly by
callers, not re-exported from __init__.py.
EOF
\)")
